content_snippet: Welcome to Masterbatch Solutions. We manufacture high-quality color masterbatches and UV additives for the plastic molding industry. Our products are used in injection molding and extrusion.
description: The company is engaged in the production of colour concentrates (coloured masterbatches and additives to the plastic industry).

content_snippet: AquaColor Systems. We specialize in water-based pigment dispersions and universal liquid dyes. Our concentrated formulas are suitable for paints, coatings, and textile applications.
description: The company is engaged in the production of concentrated water based d√≠es and universal dyes.

content_snippet: BioLab Reagents. Catalog of high-purity enzymes and proteins for diagnostic research. We supply substrates and electrolytes to laboratories worldwide. View our product list.
description: The company is engaged in the development and production of reagents (substrates, enzymes, electrolytes, proteins).

content_snippet: Footwear Chem. Providing chemical solutions for shoe factories. We offer leather finishing creams, edge dyes, and adhesives for soles and heels. Complete range of shoe care accessories available.
description: The company is engaged in the development, production, and sale of chemical products and accessories for footwear and leather goods factories (leather finishing, soles and heels, leather goods, edge dyes, shoe care).
